name: economic-control-root
description: Configuration root package for Economic Control monorepo

scripts.init: pnpm install:all && pnpm db:setup && pnpm dev
scripts.dev2: concurrently -k -s first -n SERVER,CLIENT -c green,blue "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @economic-control/server dev || true'" "sh -c 'pnpm --filter @economic-control/client dev || true'"
